definition: haloalkane (obtained from hydrocarbon by substituting halogen for hydrogen, e.g. chlorobenzene or the CFCs)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Halohydrocarbon is a high efficient of oil scale cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 鹵代烴是一類高效金屬除油清洗劑。

sentences.english: The article uses headspace gas chromatography to measure halogenated hydrocarbon in the sample water.
sentences.chinese: 應用頂空氣相色譜法測定水樣中鹵代烴。

sentences.english: Studies on the Aromatic Nucleophilic Substitution Reactions of Halogenobenzene and Their Reaction Mechanisms;
sentences.chinese: 研究了碳酸銫催化酚與鹵代烴反應制備烷基芳醚。

sentences.english: Cesium carbonate catalyzed O-alkylation of phenol to synthesize alkyl aryl ethers.
sentences.chinese: 研究了碳酸銫催化酚與鹵代烴反應制備烷基芳醚。
